name: ImmaxNeoSecurity
0:
”Alexa, open immax neo security for set away mode.”
”Alexa, open immax neo security for set stay mode.”
”Alexa, open immax neo security for set emergency mode.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: immax neo security
Developer Terms of Use
des: You can control all available functions of your smart lighting system and security system, whether it is variable intensity or thermal colouring of a light, setting colour shades, or lighting timers for various parts of your home. And it is all so simple… all you need is a smart wireless gateway and the Immax NEO app installed on your smart phone.
